item.name: Remap Caps Lock to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps Caps Lock to Control + Shift + Option + Command.
You can use this key in your own custom keyboard shortcuts you create in apps.
Caps Lock pressed alone is mapped to F19.
item.autogen:
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::F19,
KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L,
KeyCode::F19
